text: The RIM-7 Sea Sparrow is a U.S. ship-borne short-range anti-aircraft and anti- missile weapon system, primarily intended for defense against anti-ship missiles ==Operators== ===Current operators=== ; *Belgian Navy ; *Bulgarian Navy ; *Chilean Navy ; *Royal Danish Navy ; *German Navy ; *Hellenic Air Force *Hellenic Navy ; *Italian Navy ; *Japan Maritime Self-Defense Force ; *Republic of Korea Navy ; *Mexican Navy ; *Royal Netherlands Navy ; *Royal Norwegian Navy ; *Portuguese Navy ; *Spanish Navy ; *Turkish Naval Forces ; *Armed Forces of Ukraine: Unknown number to be delivered by the United States in 2023. Sea Sparrows will be mounted on the self-propelled Buk missile system. ; *United States Navy ; *Republic of China Air ForceHundreds of missiles placed ‘on hold’ as Taiwan awaits US === Former operators === ; * Royal Australian Navy ; *Royal Canadian Navy ; *Royal New Zealand Navy ==References== ==Other website== , * US Navy Sea Sparrow fact file Category:Weapons
title: RIM-7 Sea Sparrow
